description:
After some competitive bug-hunting, Kashiwada and Oota head to the beach with their friends.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun and Catching Bugs / Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun and Fireworks / Kashiwada-san and Oota-kun and the New School Term
Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun to Mushitori / Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun to Hanabi / Kashiwada-san to Oota-kun to Shingakki
柏田さんと太田君と虫取り / 柏田さんと太田君と花火 / 柏田さんと太田君と新学期
